title: Riot art Teemo

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Hi all, just drew this up in hopes of getting some RP, i need about 15 to get a 2 win IP boost. I hope this is good enough for Senpai Riot.

replies.body: just ask 15 rp and give the picture in a ticket. Dont need reason, and not on boards.
